name: agentic-coding-protocol
description: The Agentic Coding Protocol (ACP) is a protocol that standardizes communication between *code editors* (interactive programs for viewing and editing source code) and *coding agents* (programs that use generative AI to autonomously modify code).
author: Zed Industries

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist target typescript/schema.ts schema.json && cargo clean
scripts.generate: cargo run && typescript/generate.js && prettier --write typescript/schema.ts schema.json
